info.title: Product
info.description:
# General Response format
Every API will return JSON object with following properties
* status - 
__An Integer value represents HTTP status code.__
* title - 
__A human readable text summarizes the response__
* details - 
__A human readable text elaborates the response__
* timestamp - 
__An Integer value denoting Server's response timestamp in Epoch-Seconds.__
* data - 
__An optional Array structure containing additional data__

### Example
```json
{
  "status": 200,
  "title": "Success",
  "details": "Success",
  "timestamp": 1552233104,
  "data": [
    {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "OnePlus 6",
        "description": "Smart phone",
        "status": 1,
        "introduceAt": "2020-02-19T07:23:49.000Z",
        "salesDiscontinueAt": "2020-02-19T07:23:49.000Z",
        "createdBy": "admin",
        "createdAt": "2020-02-19T07:23:49.000Z",
        "updatedBy": "admin",
        "updatedAt": "2020-02-19T07:23:49.000Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

/category/rollup.description:
# General Response format
Every API will return JSON object with following properties
* status - 
__An Integer value represents HTTP status code.__
* title - 
__A human readable text summarizes the response__
* details - 
__A human readable text elaborates the response__
* timestamp - 
__An Integer value denoting Server's response timestamp in Epoch-Seconds.__
* data - 
__An optional Array structure containing additional data__

### Example
```json
{
  "status": 200,
  "title": "Success",
  "details": "Success",
  "timestamp": 1552233104,
  "data": [
    {
        "id": "913186e3-58ff-4b0a-8670-91c9d15ad123",
        "code": "92277026-e882-4286-9244-6c7bbc773944",
        "name": "Accounts Receivable",
        "description": "Accounts Receivable",
        "generalLedgerAccountId": "1",
        "status": 1,
        "enablePayments": 0,
        "systemAccount": "DEBTORS",
        "debitBalance": "0.000000",
        "creditBalance": "0.000000",
        "netBalance": "0.000000",
        "createdBy": "admin",
        "createdAt": "2020-02-19T07:23:49.000Z"
    }
  ]
}
